EmailTemplate.description: Created for request R1916591 | This survey has been sending to customers with Onboarding Stage of Live as of 4/2019
EmailTemplate.name: MyCase Onboarding tNPS Email
EmailTemplate.subject: MyCase Onboarding Customer Experience Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyCase Onboarding Customer Experience Survey
Hello {!Onboarding__c.Firm_POC_First_Name__c}!
Congratulations on being fully onboarded as a MyCase customer! We trust MyCase will simplify your day-to-day operations, from billing and invoicing, to document and case management (and much more).
Please take a moment to answer this brief one minute survey about your experience with [Onboarding_Manager__c].
https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/7196913/NEWCO-MyCase-Onboarding-Survey?m={!Onboarding__c.Id}&a={!Account.Id}&f={!Onboarding__c.Firm_POCId__c}
Thank you for your time and thoughts, we appreciate your feedback!
Adam Wilson Sr. Director, Client Services MyCase www.mycase.com
Â© 2016 MyCase, Inc. | 9201 Spectrum Center Blvd STE 100, San Diego, CA 92123
